node.title: Alleviation Measures Taken by Insurers under COVID-19
node.text: The information is collected via member survey conducted by Hong Kong Federation of Insurers. The actual measures of individual insurance companies may prevail.
node.source_description: The Hong Kong Federation of Insurers
